kama_sutra_introduction.name: Kama Sutra Introduction
kama_sutra_introduction.description: Introduction to the ancient wisdom of Vatsyayana's Kama Sutra - the science of love and pleasure
kama_sutra_introduction.instructions: Learn about the ancient principles of love, the four goals of life (Dharma, Artha, Kama, Moksha), and the spiritual aspects of intimacy.
cues: Sit comfortably together in a sacred space
Listen to the ancient wisdom of love
Understand the spiritual nature of intimacy
Learn about the four goals of life
Connect with the deeper meaning of love

gentle_touch_exploration.name: Gentle Touch Exploration
gentle_touch_exploration.description: Learn to give and receive touch with intention and care
gentle_touch_exploration.instructions: Take turns giving gentle, caring touch. Focus on presence, intention, and receiving feedback.
cues: Choose who will give touch first
Give feedback about what feels good

eye_contact_connection.name: Eye Contact Connection
eye_contact_connection.description: Build intimacy through sustained, loving eye contact
eye_contact_connection.instructions: Sit comfortably and maintain gentle eye contact. Allow yourself to be seen and to see your partner deeply.
cues: Begin with soft, gentle eye contact
Notice what you feel in your heart

breathing_together.name: Synchronized Breathing
breathing_together.description: Connect through shared breath and rhythm
breathing_together.instructions: Sit close together and synchronize your breathing. Feel the connection through shared rhythm.
cues: Sit close together, backs touching or facing each other
Begin to notice your natural breath
Feel the connection through shared rhythm

gratitude_sharing.name: Gratitude Sharing
gratitude_sharing.description: Express appreciation and gratitude for your partner
gratitude_sharing.instructions: Take turns sharing what you appreciate about each other. Be specific and heartfelt.
cues: Be specific about what you value

dharma_artha_kama_moksha.name: The Four Goals of Life
dharma_artha_kama_moksha.description: Understanding Dharma (duty), Artha (prosperity), Kama (pleasure), and Moksha (liberation) in the context of love
dharma_artha_kama_moksha.instructions: Learn about the four goals of life according to ancient Indian philosophy and how they relate to intimate relationships.
cues: Sit together in a quiet space
Listen to the explanation of the four goals
Understand how each goal relates to love
Reflect on your own relationship goals
Connect with the spiritual aspect of intimacy

khajuraho_introduction.name: Khajuraho Temple Introduction
khajuraho_introduction.description: Introduction to the sacred sculptures of Khajuraho and their spiritual significance
khajuraho_introduction.instructions: Learn about the ancient Khajuraho temples and their beautiful sculptures that depict the divine union of masculine and feminine energies.
cues: Listen to the history of Khajuraho
Understand the spiritual meaning of the sculptures
Connect with the divine aspect of love
Feel the sacred energy of union

sacred_embrace_positions.name: Sacred Embrace Positions
sacred_embrace_positions.description: Ancient positions inspired by Khajuraho sculptures for spiritual and physical union
sacred_embrace_positions.instructions: Practice sacred embrace positions that honor the divine feminine and masculine energies within each partner.
cues: Honor the sacredness of the moment

vatsyayana_introduction.name: Vatsyayana's Wisdom
vatsyayana_introduction.description: Introduction to the classical positions and techniques from the original Kama Sutra text
vatsyayana_introduction.instructions: Learn about the classical positions and techniques described by Vatsyayana in the original Kama Sutra text.
cues: Sit together in a comfortable position

classical_embrace_positions.name: Classical Embrace Positions
classical_embrace_positions.description: Traditional positions from the Kama Sutra for pleasure and spiritual connection
classical_embrace_positions.instructions: Practice the classical embrace positions as described in the original Kama Sutra text.

tantric_breathing_techniques.name: Tantric Breathing Techniques
tantric_breathing_techniques.description: Advanced breathing techniques for spiritual and physical union
tantric_breathing_techniques.instructions: Practice advanced tantric breathing techniques to enhance spiritual and physical connection.

energy_channeling.name: Energy Channeling
energy_channeling.description: Advanced energy work for spiritual and physical union
energy_channeling.instructions: Practice advanced energy channeling techniques to enhance spiritual and physical connection.

dosha_assessment.name: Dosha Assessment
dosha_assessment.description: Understanding your Ayurvedic constitution for optimal intimacy
dosha_assessment.instructions: Learn about your Ayurvedic constitution (Vata, Pitta, Kapha) and how it affects your intimate relationships.

ayurvedic_breathing.name: Ayurvedic Breathing
ayurvedic_breathing.description: Breathing techniques based on Ayurvedic principles for optimal intimacy
ayurvedic_breathing.instructions: Practice Ayurvedic breathing techniques tailored to your dosha for enhanced intimacy.

ancient_breathing_techniques.name: Ancient Breathing Techniques
ancient_breathing_techniques.description: Traditional breathing techniques from ancient texts for spiritual and physical connection
ancient_breathing_techniques.instructions: Practice ancient breathing techniques that enhance spiritual and physical connection.

spiritual_connection.name: Spiritual Connection
spiritual_connection.description: Deep spiritual connection practices for couples
spiritual_connection.instructions: Practice deep spiritual connection techniques to enhance your relationship.

temple_dance_movements.name: Temple Dance Movements
temple_dance_movements.description: Sacred dance movements inspired by temple traditions
temple_dance_movements.instructions: Practice sacred dance movements that honor the divine feminine and masculine energies.

spiritual_union_breathing.name: Spiritual Union Breathing
spiritual_union_breathing.description: Advanced breathing techniques for spiritual union
spiritual_union_breathing.instructions: Practice advanced breathing techniques for deep spiritual union.

ancient_wisdom_reflection.name: Ancient Wisdom Reflection
ancient_wisdom_reflection.description: Reflection on ancient wisdom and its application to modern relationships
ancient_wisdom_reflection.instructions: Reflect on ancient wisdom and how it applies to your modern relationship.
cues: Apply the wisdom to your life

spiritual_union_meditation.name: Spiritual Union Meditation
spiritual_union_meditation.description: Deep meditation for spiritual union between partners
spiritual_union_meditation.instructions: Practice deep meditation for spiritual union with your partner.

kama_sutra_wisdom.name: Kama Sutra Wisdom
kama_sutra_wisdom.description: Deep wisdom from the Kama Sutra for modern relationships
kama_sutra_wisdom.instructions: Learn deep wisdom from the Kama Sutra and how it applies to modern relationships.
cues: Apply the wisdom to your relationship

sacred_geometry_positions.name: Sacred Geometry Positions
sacred_geometry_positions.description: Advanced positions based on sacred geometry principles
sacred_geometry_positions.instructions: Practice advanced positions based on sacred geometry principles for spiritual and physical union.
cues: Move into the sacred geometry position

divine_connection.name: Divine Connection
divine_connection.description: Ultimate spiritual connection practice for couples
divine_connection.instructions: Practice the ultimate spiritual connection with your partner.

herbal_intimacy_guidance.name: Herbal Intimacy Guidance
herbal_intimacy_guidance.description: Ayurvedic herbal guidance for enhanced intimacy
herbal_intimacy_guidance.instructions: Learn about Ayurvedic herbs and their benefits for intimacy and health.

seasonal_intimacy_practices.name: Seasonal Intimacy Practices
seasonal_intimacy_practices.description: Ayurvedic seasonal practices for optimal intimacy
seasonal_intimacy_practices.instructions: Learn about seasonal practices that enhance intimacy according to Ayurvedic principles.

holistic_wellness_connection.name: Holistic Wellness Connection
holistic_wellness_connection.description: Holistic approach to intimacy and wellness
holistic_wellness_connection.instructions: Practice holistic wellness techniques that enhance intimacy and overall health.
